title: Hero Selection displays career options correctly
description: Verify that the Hero Selection screen loads successfully and displays all three career path options: Data Engineer, Data Scientist, and BI Analyst. Use browser automation to check UI elements on the root page.

steps.description: Open browser and navigate to http://localhost:5173/ (root URL only).
Using browser automation, verify the page contains text 'Data Engineer', 'Data Scientist', and 'BI Analyst' in the rendered HTML/DOM.
Verify that each career option card/button is clickable using browser automation (check for clickable elements, not HTTP requests).

title: Hero Selection records user choice correctly
description: Verify that when a user selects a career path via browser click, the selection is recorded and the UI transitions to Path Selection screen (React state change).

steps.description: Using browser automation, click on the 'Data Engineer' career option card/button.
Verify that the Path Selection screen appears in the DOM (check for 'Technical Mastery' or 'Soft Skills' text, not by checking URL).
Confirm the Hero Selection screen is no longer visible (React state changed).

title: Path Selection displays Technical and Behavioral tracks
description: Verify that after selecting a hero, the Path Selection screen appears showing Technical Mastery and Soft Skills & Leadership options. Use browser automation to verify UI elements.

steps.description: Using browser automation: 1) Navigate to root URL, 2) Click a hero option, 3) Wait for Path Selection to render.
Using browser automation, verify the page DOM contains text 'Technical Mastery' or 'Technical' and 'Soft Skills' or 'Behavioral' or 'Leadership'.
Verify both path option cards/buttons are clickable using browser automation.

title: Path Selection records user choice correctly
description: Verify that clicking a path option (Technical or Behavioral) updates React state and shows Career Map. Use browser automation to interact with UI.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to root, select hero, then click 'Technical Mastery' path option.
Verify Career Map appears in DOM (check for level nodes, career path text, not URL).
Go back and select 'Soft Skills & Leadership' path option using browser automation.
Verify Career Map shows different levels (Behavioral levels) using browser automation.

title: Career Map loads and displays unlocked levels accurately
description: Verify Career Map displays unlocked levels correctly. Use browser automation to check DOM elements, not HTTP requests.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate through hero selection and path selection to reach Career Map.
Using browser automation, verify unlocked level nodes are visible and clickable (check for buttons without 'disabled' attribute).
Verify locked levels are marked as disabled or have lock icons using browser automation.

title: User progress is updated and saved after completing games
description: Verify that completing a game updates the Career Map to show newly unlocked levels. Use browser automation to play game and verify UI updates.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to Career Map, click an unlocked level, complete the game.
After game completion, verify Career Map shows additional unlocked levels using browser automation (check DOM for new clickable level nodes).
Verify XP counter in top-right corner updates correctly using browser automation.

title: Story Modal shows mission briefing before games
description: Verify Story Modal appears before technical games with briefing content. Use browser automation to check modal overlay in DOM.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to Career Map, click a technical game level (not behavioral).
Verify Story Modal overlay appears in DOM (check for modal element with 'MISSION BRIEFING' text or briefing content).
Click 'START MISSION' button in modal using browser automation.
Verify game interface appears after modal dismissal.

title: Story Modal shows impact report after game completion
description: Verify Story Modal appears after game completion with impact report. Use browser automation to complete game and check modal.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Complete a game successfully.
Verify Story Modal appears with 'MISSION COMPLETE' or impact report text using browser automation.
Click 'RETURN TO HQ' button in modal using browser automation.
Verify Career Map appears after modal dismissal.

title: Pipeline Puzzle Game mechanics function correctly
description: Verify Pipeline Puzzle game loads and functions correctly. Use browser automation to interact with game UI elements.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to Career Map, select a Pipeline Puzzle level, start the game.
Verify pipeline slots and inventory items are visible and clickable using browser automation.
Click inventory items to fill pipeline slots, then click 'RUN PIPELINE' button using browser automation.
Verify game provides feedback (success/error message) using browser automation.

title: Null Runner Game collects signals and avoids noise
description: Verify Null Runner game functions correctly. Use browser automation to interact with game controls.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to Career Map, select Null Runner level, click 'START RUN' button.
Verify game interface shows lanes, health, and score displays using browser automation.
Simulate player movement using arrow keys or clicking lane zones via browser automation.
Verify score updates when signals are collected and health decreases when noise is hit using browser automation.

title: Query Master Game builds SQL queries correctly
description: Verify Query Master game allows building SQL queries. Use browser automation to select blocks and build queries.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to Career Map, select Query Master level.
Verify query blocks are visible and clickable using browser automation.
Click blocks to build a query, then click 'RUN QUERY' button using browser automation.
Verify game validates query and shows success/error feedback using browser automation.

title: Data Farm Idle Game operates as expected
description: Verify Data Farm game functions correctly. Use browser automation to plant and harvest plots.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to Career Map, select Data Farm level.
Verify farm plots are visible and clickable using browser automation.
Click empty plots to plant, wait for growth, then click ready plots to harvest using browser automation.
Verify harvest counter updates and game completes when target is reached using browser automation.

title: Server Guardian Tower Defense mechanics function correctly
description: Verify Server Guardian game functions correctly. Use browser automation to place towers and interact with game.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to Career Map, select Server Guardian level.
Verify tower placement zones are visible and clickable using browser automation.
Click tower zones to place defenses, wait for enemies to spawn using browser automation.
Verify towers attack enemies and game mechanics work correctly using browser automation.

title: Behavioral RPG Scenario Game handles decision flow correctly
description: Verify Behavioral game displays scenarios and handles decisions. Use browser automation to interact with choice buttons.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to Career Map, select Behavioral path, select a Behavioral level.
Verify scenario text and choice buttons (A, B, C) are visible using browser automation.
Click a choice button using browser automation.
Verify feedback appears explaining the choice outcome using browser automation.

title: UI consistency and responsiveness across devices
description: Verify UI is responsive across screen sizes. Use browser automation with different viewport sizes.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Set viewport to desktop size (1920x1080), navigate to root URL.
Verify Hero Selection displays correctly on desktop using browser automation.
Set viewport to mobile size (375x667) using browser automation.
Verify UI elements are responsive and functional on mobile using browser automation.

title: Root URL responds correctly and application loads
description: Verify the root URL loads the React application correctly. This is the only valid HTTP endpoint.

steps.description: Send HTTP GET request to http://localhost:5173/ (root URL only).
Verify response status is 200 and contains React app HTML.
Verify HTML contains React root element or script tags for Vite/React.

title: Error handling for invalid game inputs and unexpected user actions
description: Verify games handle invalid inputs gracefully. Use browser automation to test error scenarios.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Start a game and attempt invalid moves (e.g., wrong pipeline sequence, invalid query syntax).
Verify appropriate error messages appear using browser automation.
Using browser automation: Click 'Back' button during active game.
Verify user returns to Career Map without errors using browser automation.

title: Edge case: No career path selected and user attempts to proceed
description: Verify system prevents progression without hero selection. Use browser automation to verify UI state.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate to root URL, verify Hero Selection is displayed.
Verify Path Selection is NOT visible (check DOM for absence of path selection elements).
Verify user cannot access Career Map without selecting hero (UI prevents this via React state).

title: Edge case: No path selected and user attempts to proceed
description: Verify system prevents progression without path selection. Use browser automation to verify UI state.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Select a hero, verify Path Selection appears.
Verify Career Map is NOT visible (check DOM for absence of career map elements).
Verify user cannot access games without selecting a path (UI prevents this via React state).

title: XP counter displays and updates correctly
description: Verify XP counter in top-right corner displays correctly and updates after game completion. Use browser automation.

steps.description: Using browser automation: Navigate through hero and path selection to Career Map.
Verify XP counter is visible in top-right corner showing '0 XP' initially using browser automation.
Complete a game using browser automation.
Verify XP counter updates to show new total XP value using browser automation.
